00051 void CRYOTIMER_Init(const CRYOTIMER_Init_TypeDef *init)
00052 {
00053   CRYOTIMER->PERIODSEL = (uint32_t)init->period & _CRYOTIMER_PERIODSEL_MASK;
00054   CRYOTIMER->CTRL = ((uint32_t)init->enable << _CRYOTIMER_CTRL_EN_SHIFT)
00055                   | ((uint32_t)init->debugRun << _CRYOTIMER_CTRL_DEBUGRUN_SHIFT)
00056                   | ((uint32_t)init->osc << _CRYOTIMER_CTRL_OSCSEL_SHIFT)
00057                   | ((uint32_t)init->presc << _CRYOTIMER_CTRL_PRESC_SHIFT);
00058   CRYOTIMER_EM4WakeupEnable(init->em4Wakeup);
00059 }

00061 #endif /* defined(CRYOTIMER_PRESENT) && (CRYOTIMER_COUNT > 0) */
